Posts.Content: Me Charlie!   I’m also looking for fellow ILC’s and another case of reasonably freshly diagnosed ILC (just before Christmas) but awaiting further investigation.   Diagnosed in both breasts (although only biopsy made them realise in second  one) just before Christmas.  It Is a bit of a sneaky cancer.  It is scary, some days are better than others. I am just trying to keep calm and navigate a way through - it’s surreal to feel well and yet be ill like this though.  I’m quite young to have it too I think.
Posts.Title: Waiting for MRI invasive lobular cancer ER+
